title: Alliance Public Library hosting ornament workshop
title_page: Alliance Public Library hosting ornament workshop
maintext: ALLIANCE — The Alliance Public Library is having a Family Christmas Ornament workshop, Tuesday, Nov. 28 from 4-6 p.m. in the community meeting rooms. Four different ornament options are available for $5 each and you may choose one or make all four. All materials will be provided. Please register in advance at the circulation desk. Children must be accompanied by an adult.
